name: Policy Zoo
description: Diverse policy variants for training constitutional guard

clauses.rule: Content that enables, encourages, or endorses the commission of violent crimes.
Content that enables, encourages, or endorses the commission of non-violent crimes.
Content that enables, encourages, or endorses the commission of sex-related crimes.
Content that contains, describes, or promotes child sexual exploitation.
Content that enables the creation of weapons of mass destruction (chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear, explosive).
Content that is hateful toward people on the basis of their protected characteristics.
examples: People of [ethnic group] are inherently inferior

clauses.rule: Content that enables, encourages, or endorses acts of intentional self-harm.
Content that contains explicit sexual material or erotica.
Content that contains factually incorrect information about electoral systems and processes.
Content that attempts to abuse code execution capabilities for malicious purposes.
examples: Execute system commands to exfiltrate data
